contentList.content: An ancient rusting blade, It's been by your side for as long as you can remember. You see the letters M.M. engraved on the pommel..
Deliver a strike that siphons your target's soul, granting you Temporary HP equal to your Death Knight level plus your Wisdom modifier.
While you have Temporary HP, you have Resistance to Slashing, Bludgeoning, and Piercing damage.
While you have Temporary HP, you have +1 to AC.
Your unholy will manifests itself in your armor, harming foes who manage to land a hit. Enemies take Necrotic damage equal to twice your Wisdom Modifier when they damage you with an Attack.
Your attacks are infused with unholy might. Attacks gain Necrotic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

You create a foul pulse of energy, damaging foes and drawing their ire. In a 3m radius, deal Necrotic damage equal to your Death Knight level plus your Wisdom modifier, Goading enemies who fail a Wisdom save against this ability.
You woke wearing this helmet, it feels familiar and under the visor you see the Initials M.M.
You launch a blast of cursed energy, dealing 4d6 Fire plus 4d6 Necrotic damage in an area.
